segments.text: We are going to chain the three programs together. The input to the entire chain is the input to the first program (a long integer).
segments.label: high_level_plan

segments.text:
The output of the first program becomes the input to the second, and the output of the second becomes the input to the third. The final output is the output of the third program. Steps:
 1.

segments.text:
The second program (codeforces_514_A) reads a long integer (which is the output of the first) and transforms each digit: 
      if (9-digit) is less than the digit, then use (9-digit) unless it's the first digit and (9-digit) becomes 0 (then keep the digit). Then it forms the new number and prints it. 3.

segments.text: The third program (codeforces_579_A) reads an integer (the output of the second) and counts the number of ones in its binary representation.
